children.name: account_type
children.desc: 帐号类型。目前支持以下选项（只支持传一种）： FansID：自有粉丝ID， Mobile：手机号， YouZanAccount：有赞账号

requestDemos.code:
token = auth.Token(token='token') #auth.Sign(app_id='app_id', app_secret='app_secret')

client = YZClient(token)

params={}

params['account']="{"account_type":"Mobile","account_id":"15757161203"}"

files=[]

print client.invoke('youzan.scrm.customer.get', '3.1.0', 'GET', params=params, files=files)

'{"account_type":"Mobile","account_id":"15757161203"}', ]; $my_files = [ ]; echo '
';
var_dump(
    $client->get($method, $api_version, $my_params, $my_files)
);
echo '
';
